sentences.en: All the years since I had met Clara suddenly came tumbling down on top of me, everything my life had been, most of it nothing to do with her.
sentences.cn: 自从我遇见克拉拉以来，那些年的一景一幕一股脑涌上了我的心头，我所过的生活，我的一切大多都与她没有任何关联。

sentences.en: Clara and young Crossjay were straying.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉和小克罗斯杰在乱跑呢.

sentences.en: Clara had been reading in a lounge chair under a shady tree.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉一直坐在树阴下的躺椅上看书。

sentences.en: Clara knew of Miss Pale's romantic admiration of Sir Willoughby.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉知道帕尔小姐对威洛比爵士充满浪漫色彩的敬慕之情.

sentences.en: Clara might have stooped to listen at the door.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉很可能自甘堕落,躲在门口偷听过.

sentences.en: Clara sat leaning on the table, holding aloof.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉倚着餐桌坐着, 一副清高超然的样子.

sentences.en: Clara saw the lift of his brows.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉看见了他紧蹙的眉头.

sentences.en: Clara saw the vacancy of her expression gradually filling with woefulness.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉看到她空洞的表情中渐渐充满了悲痛.

sentences.en: Clara turned away again rather disdainfully.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉转过头去,现出一副相当倨傲轻蔑的样子.

sentences.en: Clara was full of a sombre preconception.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉心中充满了模糊的成见.

sentences.en: Clara, I heard nothing of what you said but that du.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉，你说的其他话我都没听见，只听见了那个“你”。

sentences.en: Clara's discovery of it had set his common sense adrift.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉居然发现了这个秘密,这使他在心里上有茫然若失的感觉.

sentences.en: Drive me back to Santa Clara.
Everyone’s worried about me, Clara said one afternoon.
sentences.cn: 大家担心的是我，一天下午克拉拉说。

sentences.en: I have, you see, Clara, elements in me.
sentences.cn: 你看, 克莱拉, 我是有个性的.

sentences.en: Santa Clara ? OK. That's about 20 miles away.
sentences.cn: 圣塔克莱拉? 好的, 大约是20英里远.

sentences.en: The rose came over Clara's face.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉脸上又泛起了红晕.

sentences.en: Would you mind Clara's keeping company with you?
sentences.cn: 你介意克拉拉和你交往 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 圣克拉拉（美国加利福尼亚州西部城市）；圣克拉拉（古巴中部城市）
